summary: Comprehensive testing of Industrial Analytics Platform (FactorySight) completed. Backend APIs are 88.9% functional with only ML training issues due to insufficient data. Frontend is fully functional with excellent responsive design and smooth navigation between all pages.

flaky_endpoints.issue: ML training fails with 'inconsistent numbers of samples: [98, 123]' error
flaky_endpoints.impact: Prevents ML model training but predictions still work with existing models

flaky_endpoints.issue: Predictions fail when no trained model exists

passed_tests: Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Machines, Data Upload, ML Predictions, Analytics)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix ML model training data inconsistency issue - the training dataset appears to have mismatched sample sizes (98 vs 123). This is likely due to data preprocessing or feature engineering issues in the ML training pipeline.
